acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in a POJO with basic jvm types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldGenerateBasicTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo

Then the Object OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 67 byteObjectField = 66 shortField = 114 shortObjectField = 31 charField = T charObjectField = r intField = 790398657 intObjectField = 1400570179 longField = 370791328717647 longObjectField = 370791326974005 floatField = 0.1231361 floatObjectField = 0.29834694 doubleField = 0.020375136984985054 doubleObjectField = 0.37170377070729 stringField = Dzf8DOSWlQ objectField = java.lang.Object@7c83aa9a calendarField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:14 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:14 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@6fe40fa8 intArray = [I@37f76752 booleanArray = [Z@48f7f8cc bigDecimalField = 495354782990 ) should not be null
Then the Pojo should contain some data
